channel.title: Devolio
channel.description: Minimalist Starter for Developer Blog & Portfolio Website

item.title: Synergistic Effects of Warming & CO₂‑Induced Acidification on Copper Uptake in Tilapia
item.description: Poster session at SETAC Rome (May 2018) on how temperature rise and CO₂ acidification together enhance copper nanoparticle accumulation in tilapia gills.

item.title: Role of CD44‑ICD on Hepatic Inflammation in Endotoxemic Mice
item.description: Poster session at the Toxicology Society of Taiwan (April 2021) demonstrating CD44‑ICD’s effects on LPS‑induced sepsis in mice.

item.title: Bayesian Evaluation of Nanoparticle Partitioning in Grass Carp (Under Review)
item.description: Lin H. C., Tsai Y. L., Hsiao B. R., Li L. H. (4th author) et al. present a Bayesian kinetic model for copper nanoparticle uptake and detoxification in Oreochromis niloticus.

item.title: Gan‑Lu‑Yin Mitigates Alcohol‑Induced Gastric Ulcers in Rats (Under Review)
item.description: Chandrasekaran V. R. M., Li L. H. (2nd author) et al. explore how Gan‑Lu‑Yin reduces cytokine‑mediated damage and boosts mucin secretion in ulcerated rat stomachs.

item.title: Inhibiting CD44-ICD Attenuates LPS-Induced Initiation of Hepatic Inflammation in Septic Mice
item.description: Summary of a 2024 IJMS study demonstrating how CD44-ICD inhibition mitigates hepatic inflammation in septic mice.
